scripts.install: (npm install -g firebase-tools) && (cd functions && npm i) && (cd ../client && npm i) && firebase login && firebase init
scripts.build: (cd functions && npm run build) && (cd ../client && npm run build)
scripts.lint: (cd functions && npm run lint) && (cd ../client && npm run lint)
scripts.test: (cd functions && npm run test) && (cd ../client && npm run test)
